location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor in Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing bills of table expenditure from the Residency, during a period when the Resident was absent: 10 November 1824 to 3 June 1825.
